Contains the import statements for undupy modules

Conversion factor cm to inch

Functions¶

to_scn(number[, norm])

Converts number to string using scientific notation

Module Contents¶

unduwave.unduwave_incl.to_scn(number: float, norm: bool = True)¶

Converts number to string using scientific notation

Parameters:

  • number – The number to convert

  • norm – If true, std scientific notation, False: With leading 0.

Returns:

The resulting string.
